website_summaries.verdict: This spray helps acne-prone skin, but it may be difficult to apply to certain parts of your own body.
pros: This spray contains a combination of salicylic acid, colloidal silver, and tea tree oil to help soothe skin
It absorbs quickly and doesn't leave skin sticky or smelly
It claims to help with fine lines and wrinkles as well
cons: The pump will not spray upside down, so it can be difficult to apply to your back

Also exfoliating at least once a week. This one is far cheaper than the one my dermatologist sells and I think the extra ingredients help the healing process.
